english.segment1: Stars are bright " All is right. All is gone " All is wrong
english.segment2: Overcome with this glove. Gonna change our lives. Well useful thoughts they come up now. For them we have to strive
english.segment3: All and all " All is all. His love, His love " It's from above
english.segment4: Overcome with this glove. Gonna change our lives. Well useful thoughts they come up now. For them we have to strive
